intro.title: Hi, I'm Rubesh
intro.subtitle: A passionate full-stack developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies and an evolving curiosity for automation. Dedicated to mastering new tools and building impactful digital experiences through innovation and continuous learning.

about: A tech enthusiast driven by the thrill of building and innovating. With a solid grounding in full-stack development and hands-on experience across multiple tech stacks, my journey began with a fascination for crafting responsive, user-centric web applications. Over the years, this has blossomed into a broader passion for automation, data analytics, and scalable design. My approach blends curiosity with purpose: I'm always eager to dive into new frameworks, tackle complex problems, and translate ideas into solutions that create value. Whether I'm visualizing insights, optimizing workflows, or building end-to-end systems, I thrive on pushing boundaries and staying at the frontier of technology.

responsibilities: Developed responsive React components in Next.js by translating Figma designs into pixel-perfect UI.
Integrated RESTful APIs for dynamic data rendering and cleanly structured types with TypeScript interfaces.
Resolved complex issues and errors through structured debugging and research.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams and participated in client meetings, enhancing professional communication and presentation skills.

projects.title: LMS (Library Management System)
projects.description: An E-Commerce and Inventory Management System for managing library operations using .NET Core Web API.

projects.title: Hate Speech Detection AI
projects.description: An attempt to train a model to detect if any string/text is considered hate speech.

projects.title: Python Web Scrape
projects.description: A collection of Python scripts for web scraping different types of websites.
